text: Gerrit Holdijk (17 November 1944 - 30 November 2015) was a Dutch jurist and politician. He was born in Uddel. He was a member of the Reformed Political Party (SGP). He was a member of the States-Provincial of Gelderland from 1987 to 2011. He was also a member of the Senate from 1986 to 1987 and again from 1991 to 2015. Holdijk died in Uddel from lung cancer, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Senate biography * Parlement.com biography Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Dutch Calvinists Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Members of the Senate of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Gelderland Category:Reformed Political Party politicians
title: Gerrit Holdijk
